subject: Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Marco Canola of Italy took the 13th stage of the Giro d’Italia for his first win in a Grand Tour, while the Colombian Rigoberto Urán retained the overall lead.
snippet: Marco Canola of Italy took the 13th stage of the Giro d’Italia for his first win in a Grand Tour, while the Colombian Rigoberto Urán retained the overall lead.
